text: Xu Changsheng () is a Chinese computer scientist. He is a professor at the Institute of Automation of the Chinese Academy of Sciences in Beijing and Executive Director of China-Singapore Institute of Digital Media. He was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for his contributions to multimedia content analysis. == References == ==External links== Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Chinese Academy of Sciences Category:Chinese computer scientists Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Xu Changsheng
